Title: Three new species of Agaricus section Minores from China
Abstract:
The phylogenetic trees generated through Maximum
Likelihood and Bayesian analyses for Agaricus subgenus Minores section
Minores are conducted using ITS, LSU and tef1-α genes sequences.
According to the molecular data and morphology characteristics, three
new species named as A. yanzhiensis, A. parvibrunneus and A.
pseudominipurpureus are introduced from China. The descriptions,
photographs and illustrations of those new species are presented in
detail.
